sections.title: Further reading

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The section may contain gene abbreviations.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: No gene abbreviations are present in the citations listed in this section.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Without gene abbreviations present, this requirement cannot be met.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Recommended use of gene abbreviations over full names is generally applicable to core content rather than citation lists.
The section does not include mention of specific human gene names.
Consistency in the use of American or British English is important throughout all content sections.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: No evidence of inconsistency as the language in citation naming and description adheres to neutral international science citation standards.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: The section uses neutral formatting for scientific citations, maintaining consistency.

sections.meta_notes: The citation-based nature of this section limits the applicable requirements, focusing on maintaining consistency in language usage rather than gene naming conventions.
